data.name: lrConfirmCancelWizard
data.value: Are you sure you would like to cancel the wizard and lose any unsaved information?

data.name: lrValidationCheckboxPopupMessage
data.value: Show validation messages in a popup dialog.

data.name: lrValidationCheckboxValidateControls
data.value: Do not validate hidden, disabled or read-only controls, Views and tabs.

data.name: lrLoadExistingEventMsg
data.value: You are trying to configure an existing rule. To load the existing rule click Yes, otherwise click No to configure a new rule.

data.name: lrLoadExistingEventFromSubStateMsg
data.value: This event has already been configured in a sub state. Would you like to assign this event to the current state?

data.name: lrRemoveSubFormDependenciesMsg
data.value: There are Rules dependent on this item. All dependencies will be removed.

data.name: wrnHandlerHasChildrenRemoveMsg
data.value: By removing this item, all nested items will also be removed.

data.name: wrnChangeReferenceEvent
data.value: Selecting a new event will clear your current conditions and actions. Would you like to continue?

data.name: wrnChangeReferenceTemplate
data.value: Selecting a new template will clear your current conditions and actions. Would you like to continue?

data.name: PartDependantError
data.value: This part requires {0} to be selected before it can be configured.

data.name: ErrorMsgRuleName
data.value: Please provide a name for this rule.

data.name: ErrorMsgDuplicateRuleName
data.value: A rule with this name already exists in the current context, please enter a different name.
data.comment: Warning message when user tries to add a rule with the same name as another rule.

data.name: ErrorMsgEmptyCondition
data.value: A condition must contain at least one action.

data.name: ErrorActionPartNotConfigured
data.value: The action "{0}", still has parts that need to be configured.

data.name: ErrorActionConfigurationNotConfigured
data.value: Please complete the configuration of the rule before continuing.
data.comment: This is shown when the user has not configured the rule properly.

data.name: ErrorEventPartNotConfigured
data.value: The event "{0}", still has parts that need to be configured.

data.name: ErrorConditionPartNotConfigured
data.value: The condition "{0}", still has parts that need to be configured.

data.name: ErrorPartsNotConfigured
data.value: Please complete the configuration of the rule before continuing.

data.name: DataSourceMissingError
data.value: The data source for this control is missing/invalid. Try configuring the data source.
data.comment: This is an error message in a popup shown to the user when the data source that was bound to the control was deleted.

data.name: ActionTransformationFailedMsg
data.value: One or more actions could not be transformed.

data.name: ConditionTransformationFailedMsg
data.value: One or more conditions could not be transformed.

data.name: HandlerTransformationFailedMsg
data.value: One or more handlers could not be transformed.

data.name: EventTransformationFailedMsg
data.value: The event could not be transformed.

data.name: ErrorHandlersOrder
data.value: An Else block must follow an If block or an Else-If block. An Else block may not follow an Error, Else or For Each block.

data.name: ErrorEmptyHandlers
data.value: Each block requires at least one action.

data.name: TemplateChangedMsg
data.value: There are actions associated with the rule. Would you like to remove these actions?

data.name: ConfigRequiredMsg
data.value: There are mappings that need to be configured.
data.comment: Mappings are two items which are bound by configuration

data.name: WatermarkTextTooltip
data.comment: Rules designer context menu popup item tooltip.

data.name: WatermarkMessage
data.value: Type text and/or drop multiple fields

data.name: ValidationRequiredFailed
data.value: Please specify a value for the required field "{0}".
data.comment: [to be reviewed]

data.name: ValidationUnitFailed
data.value: You have entered an invalid {0}. Only whole numbers, pixel values, between 70 and 32767, and percentages not exceeding 100% are supported.
data.comment: [to be reviewed]

data.name: RuleSettingsPanelHeading
data.value: Enter a name and description for the rule

data.name: MailMappingWidgetFromAddressRequired
data.value: You have to supply a single valid From address for this message.

data.name: MailMappingWidgetRecipientRequired
data.value: There must be at least one email address in the To, CC or BCC fields. All email addresses must be valid and comma separated.

data.name: MailMappingWidgetToInvalid
data.value: All email addresses in the To field must be valid and comma separated.

data.name: MailMappingWidgetCCInvalid
data.value: All email addresses in the CC field must be valid and comma separated.

data.name: MailMappingWidgetBCCInvalid
data.value: All email addresses in the BCC field must be valid and comma separated.

data.name: BrowserNavigateMappingWidgetURLValidationMessage
data.value: You are required to supply a base URL.

data.name: BrowserNavigateMappingWidgetParameterValidationMessage
data.value: Supply a name for this parameter.

data.name: BrowserNavigateMappingWidgetRemoveAllParametersValidation
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove all the URL parameters?

data.name: ReadOnlyWidgetNoItemsConfigured
data.value: At least one item needs to be configured as read-only or editable otherwise the action must be removed.

data.name: SetPropertiesNoItemsText
data.value: Please configure at least one mapping.

data.name: ErrorMsgEventConditionActionNeeded
data.value: Add an Event, Condition or Action to configure a Rule.
data.comment: Warning message when user tries to add a rule with no events/conditions/actions specified[designtime]

data.name: DescriptionTooltip
data.comment: This is the description tooltip that was typed into the description box on the rule settings popup which describes a rule

data.name: NameTooltip
data.comment: This is the name tooltip that contains the name of the rule

data.name: NoItemsToDisplayNoRightsRemoved
data.value: There are no items to display. Either the process has been deleted or you do not have the required process rights to view it.
data.comment: Message that is shown to the user when he is trying to access a process that has either been deleted or he does not have the required process rights to view it.

data.name: Allocate
data.comment: Defines if an item should be allocated or not

data.name: MappingTargetHeading
data.comment: Rules Designer heading on left tab that specifies the available target items

data.name: InheritedRuleItemInErrorToolTip
data.value: Edit the view or form to fix this.
data.comment: Used for inherited Rules that are in error as line 2 of a tooltip to indicate that the user should edit the view or form that the inherited rule was created in

data.name: NoItemsToDisplayActivityNotFound
data.value: There are no items to display. Either the activity has been removed, or is available on a non-default version of the process, or you do not have the required process rights to view it. As a result, this condition or action cannot be configured.
data.comment: Message that is shown to the user when he is trying to access an activity that has either been deleted, exists on a non-default version of the process, or he does not have the required process rights to view it.

data.name: HeaderWorkFlowDataMappingsProcessAction
data.comment: The save form field to workflow data header in the "action a worklist item" action's configure popup.

data.name: HeaderWorkFlowDataMappingsProcessStart
data.comment: The workflow fields header in the "start a workflow" action's configure popup.

data.name: HeaderWorkFlowItemMappingsProcessAction
data.comment: The work item bindings header in the "action a worklist item" action's configure popup for process action.

data.name: HeaderWorkFlowItemMappingsProcessLoad
data.comment: The work item bindings header in the "action a worklist item" action's configure popup for process load.

data.name: HeaderWorkFlowItemMappingsProcessStart
data.comment: The specify workflow header in the "start a workflow" action's configure popup.

data.name: Literal
data.comment: Used to indicate whether a field is a literal value or not (i.e whether field is rendered as HTML (literal = true) or encoded and rendered as text (literal = false))

data.name: TitleLiteral
data.value: A Literal field is rendered as HTML (checked), otherwise, encoded and rendered as text (unchecked)
data.comment: tooltip that goes with the name="Literal" resource entry

data.name: lrRuleMustContainEventErrorMsg
data.value: Server-based rules must contain an event. Create a new rule if you need a rule without an event.

data.name: lrSupportedChildTypeErrorMsg
data.value: You cannot convert this to a client event rule because it contains server-side conditions, actions, or mappings. Create a new rule and select a client event before configuring your conditions and actions.

data.name: lrSupportedParentTypeErrorMsg
data.value: You cannot convert this to a server event rule because it contains client-side conditions, actions, or mappings. Create a new rule and select a server event before configuring your conditions and actions.

data.name: VerticalAlignValidationFailed
data.value:
Please specify a valid value for Vertical Align.
Only Middle or Auto are supported.
data.comment: SubForm configuration error
